BlackFortress/Alecto/Luzbel/Shiva/Kali/Attila/3 bat probes::

Luzbel/Shivah/Kali/Attila/Alecto::


Alecto heard the alarm and saw four big robots running towards the 
exit, she recieved a menssage of Darkfate, and told to Destructor "As 
soon as a idiot-bot named Chameleon appear I'll go to fight... 
Leader's command"

Black Fortress.

BlackFortress's cannons, that were close of undewater's exit shot 25 
times against Slayer.


3 bat probes::

the bat probes arrived and started shooting against Slayer
